name: @ultimaker/curaenginejs
description: CuraEngineJS a TS component to run CuraEngine in a browser

scripts.install_curaengine: conan install ${npm_package_config_conan_package} -s build_type=Release --build=missing --update -c tools.build:skip_test=True -pr:h cura_wasm.jinja -if src && rm -f src/*conan*

author: UltiMaker
